<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>ais_genius_result_configuration</collection> <condition>current.trigger_condition.changes()</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Create or update GRA</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var util = new AisGeniusResultUtil(); if (current.trigger_condition == 'intent') util.createOrUpdateGRAByConfiguration(current.getUniqueValue()); if (previous.trigger_condition == 'intent') util.createOrUpdateGRAByConfiguration(previous.getUniqueValue());
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-26 03:42:31</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>23843f7653e11010bca8ddeeff7b129d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Create or update GRA</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="AI Search" source="com.glide.ais">eb04fc283c31311068bcf327dfe37f93</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_23843f7653e11010bca8ddeeff7b129d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-09-23 17:15:23</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=23843f7653e11010bca8ddeeff7b129d"/> </record_update>
